name: Michael Hartmann
text: [@roytang](https://twitter.com/roytang/) Hi, my name is Michael from Germany, you may be interested in learning a new language without Learning Stress in only 7 weeks with at least 17 Minutes A Day.  A new language is easy and comfortable to learn in much shorter! Save 50% https://www.17-minute-languages.com/en/?id=MH130627  Thank you  Michael
